title: New adc who should I buy and why?
body: Should I get Kai.sa or Xayah

replies.body: Xayah just got nerfed but i still think she is op with the right Rakan honestly just see if you like Kai sa since she is free to play atm
Xayah is great if you're a good adc. Kai sa is still new so if you're tight on BE i wouldn't suggest her. My personal favourite is twitch and recommend any adc main to buy him.
